nodes.text: The Ga'Garen Codex was a grimoire which was thousands of years old by the High Republic Era, when it was held in the Jedi Archives. Its mysteries had confounded linguists for a very long time. Jedi Master Elzar Mann, seeking answers about a Force vision he had had after the dedication of the Starlight Beacon, consulted the Codex. The answers he received led him to travel to Ashla, a moon of the sacred planet Tython.
